item.title: REINFORCE++: A Simple and Efficient Approach for Aligning Large Language Models
item.description: REINFORCE++, a novel RLHF algorithm, achieves superior training stability and computational efficiency compared to existing methods like PPO and GRPO, while maintaining comparable performance.

item.title: Stylecodes: Encoding Stylistic Information For Image Generation
item.description: StyleCodes enables easy style sharing for image generation by encoding styles as compact strings, enhancing control and collaboration while minimizing quality loss.
